summary: This mod changes the names of Dwarven items added by Dawnguard to more appropriate \"Dwemer.\"
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the name of Dwarven crossbow and its bolts into the more lore friendly \"Dwemer Crossbow.\" This changes all instances of crossbows and bolts. If I have missed anything, please send me a PM or comment on the page.

I strongly recommend using the mod Lore Friendly - Dwemer Names:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6610

It requires the latest update (1.8) and Dawnguard

This is also my first mod!
author: Gheart
